home.title: Diversified Educational Portfolios Generator
home.subtitle: Applying Modern Portfolio Theory to Lifelong Learning
home.description: Just as financial portfolio theory optimizes investments by diversifying across assets, our platform diversifies your skill training across multiple domains to create optimal, future-ready e-learning programs.
home.concept_text: Based on the research of Kanzola & Petrakis (2024) and Markowitz's Modern Portfolio Theory, we treat skill categories as 'asset classes' and optimize your learning portfolio for maximum professional growth with minimized obsolescence risk.
home.step1_desc: Provide sector reports and BERTopic metric data
home.step2_desc: AI generates the affinity matrix and program metadata
home.step3_desc: MPT optimization finds the ideal skill weights
home.step4_desc: AI creates complete e-learning course outlines
home.settings_api_key_hint: Optional — server key will be used if not provided
home.projects_empty: No projects yet. Create your first project to get started.
home.projects_delete_confirm: Delete this project? This cannot be undone.
home.get_started_subtitle: Set up your AI provider to begin
